entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
